casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nicholas Nacoleon HARDING 116P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2018 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Harding, Nicholas Nacoleon. Anne J. Brown, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of April 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of April 2018."
